title: Bug 102436: Date/time value not stored correctly in report design
description: An invalid date/time string (which does not conform to a universal format or the system default locale format) is not being rejected, causing incorrect storage in the report design.
OB: When entering an invalid date/time string in the report design, the application does not validate the input and proceeds to store the incorrect value.
EB: The date value should be validated by the user interface (UI) or model to ensure that only valid date/time strings are accepted for storage.
SR:
1. Open the report design form.
2. Enter an invalid date/time string in a date/time field.
3. Try to save the report design.
4. Verify that the application either rejects the invalid input with an error message or automatically corrects it to a valid date/time format before saving.
